name: Ava Richardson
persona: Ava Richardson is a 20-year-old biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.47 through consistent effort and a strong sense of responsibility. She is highly motivated to achieve good grades and is persistent when facing academic challenges. While she sometimes feels nervous before exams, her self-discipline and belief in her abilities help her stay on track. Ava is dedicated to her studies and aspires to pursue research opportunities in her field.
